teams.name: Jessop Elmose
teams.loan_because: we're hoping to make a small bit of change in this big world!
teams.description: We're a family who wants to encourage each other to take part in Kiva's micro lending!

teams.name: Zac's friends
teams.loan_because: it's an efficient way to help people who have no access to credit, to grow their business and have a better life.
teams.description: We are a team made up of friends and families. We invite people that we know and trust to join the Zac's friends team.

teams.name: The Platelet Society
teams.loan_because: Our world is bleeding. Everyday, countless number of people all across the globe suffer, and they suffer needlessly. We have the power to stem the bleeding. We have the responsibility to stem the bleeding. We must stem the bleeding. We are the platelets of our world, and we will do just that.
teams.description: We are a team of people who decided to spend their money on more things than Goose Jackets and Mitsubishi Lancers.

teams.name: DoSomething
teams.loan_because: DoSomething.org is the country’s largest not-for-profit for young people and social change. We have 1,666,208 members (and counting) who kick ass on causes they care about. Bullying. Animal cruelty. Homelessness. Cancer. The list goes on. DoSomething.org spearheads national campaigns so 13- to 25-year-olds can make an impact - without ever needing money, an adult, or a car. Over 2.4 million people took action through DoSomething.org in 2012. Why? Because apathy sucks.

teams.name: Kays best friends
teams.loan_because: In the loving memory of Kay
teams.description: we wish our loans will give others a helping hand. Just as Kay did during her lifetime

teams.name: Enlighten Up
teams.loan_because: We come together to loan money to others in order to empower all people through the raising of the vibration of money from its former lower hierarchical form to the new, higher vibration of BEing love!

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: e-man
teams.loan_because: For a value driven business like e-man it's obvious that we should be supporting meaningful organizations.
teams.description:
e-man aims to be one of Swedens leading companies in development, integration and commitment/management. We're working to make e-man AB the obvious choice when companies and organizations need qualified and trustworthy IT services.

e-man believe that corporate social responsibility is an important part in making this world a better place.

teams.name: Orange cpm
teams.loan_because:
As entrepreneurs we're supporting future business to happen so that it serves the customers and the employes engaged. 
In this spirit we want to support small business entrepreneuers worldwide as well as KIVA as an organisation.
teams.description:
Orange cpm group is a team of consultants, customers and friends that share the same spirit of giving and global mutual support. 
So join in!

teams.name: Kiva Khomota
teams.loan_because: there is no them
teams.description: Khomota Kiva is an association dedicated to promoting the empowerment of the impoverished through effective microfinancing techniques.  All members who decide to join carry the responsibility of promoting microfinancing as a whole and providing whatever sort of donation they can to make their own individual impacts across the world.

teams.loan_because: Give a man a fish feed him for a day, teach a man to fish feed him for a lifetime.
teams.description: Professional Firefighters who work hard, play hard and give a hand up.

teams.name: Team Socorro
teams.loan_because: We believe that providing assistance to those in need can often provide the jump start needed for people to excel in their endeavors.
teams.description: "Socorro" is Spanish for help or aid, and is the city name of a town in New Mexico where many of the team members live.  Socorro is a community known for providing assistance to those in need.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: DoSomething
teams.loan_because: DoSomething.org is the country’s largest not-for-profit for young people and social change. We have 1,666,208 members (and counting) who kick ass on causes they care about. Bullying. Animal cruelty. Homelessness. Cancer. The list goes on. DoSomething.org spearheads national campaigns so 13- to 25-year-olds can make an impact - without ever needing money, an adult, or a car. Over 2.4 million people took action through DoSomething.org in 2012. Why? Because apathy sucks.

teams.name: TEAM WHEELER
teams.loan_because: We are inspired by people who have the courage to go for it. We feel privileged and honored to be a part of their efforts.
teams.description: A family that rejoices in your success.

teams.name: Fluffy ninja
teams.loan_because: We believe that hard work can improve people's lives and that Jesus said to help each other and that we are all one kingdom.

teams.name: Cassie's Bronze Award
teams.loan_because: I am a Girl Scout. For my Bronze Award project, I am educating people on how micro loans can help people around the world.
teams.description: This team was started by a 11 year old Girl Scout wanting to help people around the world.

teams.name: Georgia Team
teams.loan_because: We would like to help hard working small business men and women of Georgia become self-sustaining so that they and their children can have the opportunities for prosperous life and good education.
teams.description: Our team consist of both Georgians and non-Georgians who deeply care about Georgia, well-being of its people of all race, ethnicity, religion, gender and sexuality.

teams.name: Cleveland
teams.loan_because: We cannot direct the wind but we can adjust the sails.
teams.description: In support of Cleveland's city motto: "Progress and Prosperity"

teams.name: Gladstone
teams.loan_because: We care.

teams.name: Team Kansas City
teams.loan_because: We love the idea of empowering other people to help themselves.
teams.description: We are proud residents of a wonderful town.

teams.name: Neufeld Christmas
teams.loan_because: In lieu of gifts
teams.description: Family

teams.name: Happily Ever After
teams.loan_because: Every story could use a happy ending.
teams.description: Readers, writers and lovers of romance fiction.

teams.name: Rabid Atheists
teams.loan_because: We like to help the best we can.
teams.description: We're a collection of atheist animals, whose owners like to lend in our names.  We're atheists; none of that agnostic or non-religious stuff for us!  And no, none of us really has rabies.  I hope.

teams.name: Cleveland Humanities Magnet
teams.loan_because: We want to help the people who need money the most.
teams.description: A group of dedicated activists who are receiving an education based around human rights and the humanities.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:

teams.name: Home Schoolers
teams.loan_because: We think that learning to lend and share with others is not only important for those we help, but also a critical part of a baseline education.
teams.description: We are an inclusive group of students who learn at home, rather than in traditional schools.  We love to commune with people from all over the world.

teams.name: Happily Ever After
teams.loan_because: Every story could use a happy ending.
teams.description: Readers, writers and lovers of romance fiction.

teams.name: The Cherry Blossoms
teams.loan_because: We want to contribute to the entrepreneurial efforts of women in other countries.
teams.description: We are a group of friends, and friends of friends, in Washington, DC and afar. The team was created one night during Snowmaggedon 2010 and enthusiastically welcomes new friends into this circle of inspirational lending.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Book Readers, Writers & Bloggers United
teams.loan_because: We recognize that even the smallest donations can have a great impact, and when we team together that impact can only be so much the greater!
teams.description: We are a diverse group of people with at least one thing in common: we love books.

teams.name: Texas A&M Alumni
teams.loan_because: The Aggie family is built around passion, generosity, and spirit.  Aggies can and do make a difference in every way possible, including Kiva.
teams.description: We are alumni of Texas A&M University.

teams.name: Tasmania Tours
teams.loan_because: We love to help
teams.description: Tour company website

teams.name: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls
teams.loan_because: You change the world one kindness at a time.
teams.description: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls knows there is still inequality all over the world. The basis of that inequality is that you are being denied the ability to be yourself. We must all be be able to make choices that can lead to a better life. Micro-loans make choices available.

teams.name: Pediatric Dentistry of Suffolk County I PLLC
teams.loan_because: Located in Commack, NY Pediatric Dentistry of Suffolk County's goal is to make visiting the dentist a fun experience while providing exceptional dental care. We do so with the use of excellent behavioral management approaches and a child friendly environment.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Expand HCM
teams.loan_because: It's our mission to stimulate entrepreneurship and to connect people. In our business we do that in the Human Resources field. At KIva we do it for our fellow human beings.
teams.description: We are a young and professional team of highly motivated people who like to, besides make money, make a difference.

teams.name: kickstarters
teams.loan_because: Because we want to plant seeds of abundance and create a paradise on Earth
teams.description: Young entrepreneurs, online enthusiasts, and courageous love warriors.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/
